mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckillActivity.seckill_id", s.name "seckillActivity.name", s.number "seckillActivity.number", s.start_time "seckillActivity.start_time", s.end_time "seckillActivity.end_time", s.create_time "seckillActivity.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckillActivity s ON sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
